effects: +5 initiative; can't be surprised; unseen attackers don’t gain advantage.
name: Alert

effects: +1 Str or Dex; climbing not difficult; stand up from prone costs 5 ft.
name: Athlete

effects: Dash then bonus-action melee shove/attack with bonus damage.
name: Charger

effects: +1 Con; hit die minimum = 2× Con mod.
name: Durable

effects: -5 to hit for +10 damage; bonus action attack on crit/kill.
name: Great Weapon Master

effects: Ignore cover; long-range no disadvantage; -5/+10 ranged.
name: Sharpshooter

effects: Opportunity hits reduce speed to 0; ignore Disengage; reaction on attacks vs allies.
name: Sentinel

effects: +1 to chosen ability; gain its save proficiency.
name: Resilient

effects: 3 luck points to reroll attacks/checks/saves (choose result).
name: Lucky

effects: +2 HP per level.
name: Tough

effects: Advantage on concentration; somatic with hands full; cast as OA.
name: War Caster

effects: +10 speed; dash over difficult terrain; no OA from target you attack.
name: Mobile

effects: +1 Int or Wis; +5 passive Perception/Investigation; lip-reading.
name: Observant

effects: Bonus-action butt-end attack; OA when enter reach.
name: Polearm Master

effects: Add shield to Dex saves vs effects; shove bonus action; no damage on successful Dex save.
name: Shield Master

effects: +1 Cha; advantage to mimicry/disguise voice.
name: Actor

effects: Ignore loading; no disadvantage in melee; bonus-action hand crossbow shot.
name: Crossbow Expert

effects: +1 AC while dual-wielding; draw two; use non-light 1h weapons.
name: Dual Wielder

effects: +1 Dex/Int/Wis/Cha; reroll one die on advantage with chosen stat attacks.
name: Elven Accuracy

effects: +1 Str or Con; gain heavy armor proficiency.
name: Heavily Armored

effects: Advantage vs unmounted; redirect attacks to you; mount evasion-like.
name: Mounted Combatant

effects: Hide better in dim light; missed ranged doesn’t reveal; see in dim light.
name: Skulker
